course_title: Negotiation and Conflict Management in the Healthcare Setting
class_notes: This is a synchronous online class.
course_description: The purpose of this course is to understand the basic theory and processes of negotiation so that the student can negotiate successfully in a variety of organizational settings. Students will develop these skills by preparing for and simulating a variety of case study negotiations.
sections: Class Nbr: 4540, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 1-3:50p, Instructor: E. Becker, Status: Open
